mapper.select: select pet_id as petId, pet_name as petName, pet_gender as petGender, pet_breed as petBreed, pet_type as petType, pet_profile_img_url as petProfileImgUrl, pet_birth as petBirth, timestampdiff(year, pet_birth, curdate()) as pet_age from pet_tb where user_id = #{userId}

select h.healthlog_id, h.water_status, h.food_status, h.poop_cnt from healthlog_tb h join pet_tb p on h.pet_id = p.pet_id where p.user_id = #{userId} and DATE(h.created_dt) = curdate() order by h.created_dt DESC limit 1
select p.post_id, p.user_id, u.name, p.post_img_url, p.post_like_cnt, p.created_dt from post_tb p left join user_tb u on p.user_id = u.user_id order by p.post_like_cnt DESC limit 4
